name: ServiceNow
description: The ServiceNow connector allows you to access the ServiceNow REST API through WSO2 MI. ServiceNow is a software platform that supports IT service management and automates common business processes. This software as a service (SaaS) platform contains a number of modular applications that can vary by instance and user.

operations.name: ServiceNow Connection
operations.description: ServiceNow Connection

operations.name: Get Records
operations.description: Retrieves set of records from table.

operations.name: Get Record By ID
operations.description: Retrieves record according to the system ID from table.

operations.name: Create Record
operations.description: Insert a record into a table.

operations.name: Update Record (Patch)
operations.description: Patch a record from table by specifying system ID.

operations.name: Delete Record
operations.description: Delete a record from table by specifying system ID.

operations.name: Replace Record (Put)
operations.description: Put a record to table by specifying system ID.

operations.name: Create Staging Record
operations.description: This method inserts incoming data into a specified staging table and triggers transformation based on predefined transform maps in the import set table.

operations.name: Get Staging Record
operations.description: This method retrieves the associated record and resulting transformation result.

operations.name: Get Aggregate Statistics
operations.description: Allow to compute aggregate statistics about existing table and column data.
